name: Puzzle - LINES AND KNOTS
description:
Free logical puzzle game for meditation. The goal of the player is to assemble a puzzle consisting of nodes. Easy-to-grasp mechanics, swap hexagons with lines.

The free version includes 20 levels, if you liked the games, please purchase an additional set of 80 levels ( DLC ).

▪ 100 Levels
▪ Achievements

Update 09.03.2020:
- Fixed level 67
- Fixed a “freeze” bug with a help button at level 41
- Now you can dynamically change the screen resolution (click "FullScreen" in game and drag the mouse cursor over the edge of the window)
- Fixed a bug where the player did not receive the achievement “Level 20” without purchased DLC
